000110 00000 00000 00001 00000 000000   # in $r1
000000 00001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r1
00000000000000000000000000110000        # 48(= 0)

000110 00000 00000 00010 00000 000000   # in $r2
000000 00010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r2
00000000000000000000000000001010        # 10(= LF)

000110 00000 00000 00011 00000 000000   # in $r3
000000 00011 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r3
00000000000000000000000000110001        # 49(= 1)

000110 00000 00000 00100 00000 000000   # in $r4
000000 00100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r4
00000000000000000000000000110010        # 50(= 2)

000110 00000 00000 00101 00000 000000   # in $r5
000000 00101 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r5
00000000000000000000000000100000        # 32(= <space>)

000110 00000 00000 00110 00000 000000   # in $r6
000000 00110 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r6
00000000000000000000000000111001        # 57(= 9)

000110 00000 00000 00111 00000 000000   # in $r7
000000 00111 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r7
00000000000000000000000000001010        # 10(= LF)

000110 00000 00000 01000 00000 000000   # in $r8
000000 01000 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r8
00000000000000000000000001100001        # 97(= a)

000110 00000 00000 01001 00000 000000   # in $r9
000000 01001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r9
00000000000000000000000000001010        # 10(= LF)

000110 00000 00000 01010 00000 000000   # in $r10
000000 01010 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r10
00000000000000000000000001100010        # 98(= b)

000110 00000 00000 01011 00000 000000   # in $r11
000000 01011 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r11
00000000000000000000000001100011        # 99(= c)

000110 00000 00000 01100 00000 000000   # in $r12
000000 01100 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r12
00000000000000000000000000100000        # 32(= <space>)

000110 00000 00000 01101 00000 000000   # in $r13
000000 01101 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r13
00000000000000000000000001111010        # 122(= z)

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
